constituent: spread, arrowhead, rice field, brains, compass, direction, taskmaster
heisigStory: At the top we have the arrowhead whose vertical line joins it to the rice field (or brains) below it. Beneath it, the compass; and to the right, the taskmaster.
koohiiStory1: Instead of being glued to one specialty (#46) 専, I decided to spread my attention in many directions 方, and be a taskmaster at none.
koohiiStory2: Arrowheads are spread all over the field. The taskmaster profiteerer forces you to find them all using a compass.
words:
屋敷(やしき): mansion
座敷(ざしき): tatami room
敷地(しきち): site
敷く(しく): spread out, to lay out, take a position
風呂敷(ふろしき): wrapping cloth, cloth wrapper
